meanings.sent1: My fathers always take me fishing on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Many fathers enjoy playing catch with their children.
meanings.sent3: The fathers at the park organized a fun picnic for all the families.
meanings.sent4: In the animal kingdom, lion fathers protect their cubs fiercely.
meanings.sent5: The wise fathers in the village council provided guidance to the young ones.

meanings.definition: To be the creator, founder, or originator of something.
meanings.sent1: The artist fathers a new style of painting that becomes popular.
meanings.sent2: Steve Jobs famously fathers the iPhone, revolutionizing technology.
meanings.sent3: The inventor fathers a machine that can do all the chores in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her groundbreaking research fathers a new era in medicine.
meanings.sent5: The writer fathers a captivating story that captures the readers' hearts.

meanings.definition: To act as a father or father figure to someone.
meanings.sent1: He fathers his niece after her parents passed away.
meanings.sent2: The coach fathers the young athletes, teaching them valuable life lessons.
meanings.sent3: The teacher fathers a sense of curiosity and wonder in his students.
meanings.sent4: The mentor fathers a new generation of leaders in the company.
meanings.sent5: The superhero fathers a sidekick to help fight crime in the city.
